long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CF FetchCodes: Learn from your friends' program on CodeForces!

Stuck on a CodeForces problem? CF FetchCodes lets you see the accepted solutions of your friends directly on the problem page.

What is CF FetchCodes?

CF FetchCodes is a browser extension designed to enhance your CodeForces experience. It allows you to access the accepted codes of your friends, providing valuable insights and inspiration to help you improve your coding skills.

Features:

  -  View accepted codes:  See how your friends have solved the problem.
  -  Syntax highlighting:  Easily read and understand the code.
  -  Profile & submission links:  Quickly jump to your friend's profile or their submission.

How to use:

  1. Install CF FetchCodes.
  2. Go to a CodeForces problem page.
  3. Find the "Accepted Codes of Friends" section in the sidebar.
  4. Click "Show Code" to view your friend's solution.

Important:

  -  Only works outside of contests, i.e. you cannot see any submissions while a contest is running. Also, you cannot see any 'private' submissions. 

  -  Does not work for Gym problems.

Boost your coding skills by learning from the best! Install CF FetchCodes today!


Contribute to CF FetchCodes!

     CF FetchCodes is an open-source project, and we welcome contributions from the community! If you're passionate about improving the CodeForces experience, head over to our GitHub repository: https://github.com/sa-paul/CF_FetchCodes

    Whether you're fixing bugs, adding new features, or improving documentation, your contributions are highly valued. Let's work together to make CF FetchCodes even better!


Upcoming Features!

We're constantly working to improve CF FetchCodes. Here's a sneak peek at what's coming soon:

  -  Dark Mode:  For all you night owls, we're adding a sleek dark mode to reduce eye strain and enhance readability in low-light environments.

  -  Customizable Highlighters:  Choose from a variety of code highlighting themes to suit your personal preference and coding style.

  -  AI Program Explainer:  Get a deeper understanding of your friends' code with our upcoming AI-powered program explainer. This feature will provide concise and insightful explanations of complex code snippets, helping you learn and improve your own coding skills.

Stay tuned for these exciting updates!




CF FetchCodes Release Notes

Version 0.1.0

This release introduces several new features and improvements to enhance the user experience:

  -  Added Code Highlighter:  Code readability has been significantly improved with the implementation of syntax highlighting. The highlighter mirrors the default style used on CodeForces for a seamless transition.
  -  Bug Fixes:  This version addresses various bugs encountered in previous iterations, including issues with repetitive code occurrences and "code not found" errors. These fixes contribute to a smoother and more reliable user experience.
  -  Clickable Button:  Navigating to a friend's profile or their specific submission is now easier with the addition of a clickable button. This streamlines the process of accessing additional information related to the displayed code.
  -  Enhanced Speed:  Performance optimizations have been implemented to accelerate code fetching. The extension now operates with a rate limit of 5 fetches every 6.5 seconds, ensuring a balance between speed and responsible API usage.

Version 0.1.1

  -  Enhanced Security and Stability: This update focuses on enhancing the extension's security and stability by removing remotely hosted code within a Manifest V3 item. This change eliminates potential security risks and ensures the extension remains compliant with Chrome Web Store policies, making it free from removal risk.
